import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const EditProudct = () => { const {id} = useParams(); let [thisProduct, setThisProduct] = useState({}); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/api/Products/${id}`) .then (res=>{ console.log(res) console.log(res.data.Product) setThisProduct(res.data.Product) }) }, []) return (

Edit Product

) } export default EditProudct;
